text: The Continental A-40 is an aircraft engine made by Continental Motors and is especially made for light aircraft. == Variants == A40 ; A40-2 ; A-40-3 ; A40-4 ; A40-5 == Users == * Aeronca KC * Arup S-2 * Heath Parasol LNA-40 * Nicholson Junior KN-2 * Piper J-3 Cub * Porterfield CP-40 Zephyr * Rose Parakeet * Taylor E-2 Cub * Taylor J-2 Cub * Welch OW-5M Category:Aircraft engines
title: Continental A-40
